newsitem.title: SOUTH KOREA: Two S.Korean firms buy 23,000T of U.S. wheat.
newsitem.headline: Two S.Korean firms buy 23,000T of U.S. wheat.

text.p: Two South Korean flour mills, Dongah Flour Mills Co Ltd and Cheiljedang Corp, on Wednesday bought a total of 23,000 tonnes of U.S. wheat from Mitsubishi Corp, traders said.
Out of the total, Cheiljedang bought 11,000 tonnes at basis over December futures on the Chicago Board of Trade while Dongah bought the rest at flat prices.
Shipment was set for October 25-November 25 from the Pacific Northwest to the western port city of Inchon.
